jd: Greetings from Sligo Software Solutions, Inc. !!SLIGO is a Software Development & IT Consulting company. We have around 100+ IT associates working with our esteemed clients across several domains such as IT, Banking, Healthcare, and Government. We have an urgent requirement for .NET Architect with Oracle DB position with our client. Role: .NET Architect with Oracle DBLocation: Albany, New YorkDuration: 30 MonthsJob ID: SLG - 19 - 9930Client: NY StateRespond by Date: 10/22/24 5:00 PM Description This project involves the upgrading and combining of various aging systems into one comprehensive internal Financial Mangement System (FMS).Duties The System Architect will work closely with the FMS Project Manager and technical staff to evaluate, improve, redesign and rewrite the various systems that comprise the FMS system.The candidate of this position will be responsible for, but not limited to:Design and Development of the new FMS Application projectResearch and provide architectural review and direction of various other Microsoft .Net 6.0 based open system applications.Create cradle to grave UML diagrams for entire to-be systemProvide mentoring and guidance to our .Net development staff.Guidance and assistance in maintaining other OTDA’s critical .Net applications (includes approximately 25 applications).Establishes, monitors and ensures that project goals/objectives are met; managing daily work/priorities.Mandatory Requirements Experience (14+ Years)Defines the architecture of a computerized system (i.e., a system composed of software and hardware) in order to fulfill certain requirement, including a breakdown of the system into components, the component interactions and interfaces (including with the environment, especially the user), and the technologies and resources to be used in the design.Requirements This is an 100% OnsiteA bachelor’s degree84 month’s experience designing application architecture, developing & deploying n-tier asp.Net Web apps using vb.net web services and Windows Communication Foundation.84 months experience analyzing business processes and workflows; and working with non-technical staff to develop system specifications and resolve issues.60 months experience using Oracle and PL/SQL packages including SQL programming and JSON.36 months experience as a Web GUI designer including accessibility compliance and using Angular Single Page Applications (SPA), Redux, Angular versions 9 thru 14.24 months experience development applications relating to government human service eligibility systems.36 months experience using object-oriented principles and concepts to design complex business objects36 months experience using SQL Reporting Services (SSRS)36 months experience development applications utilizing MVC.NetRésuméCopy of Candidate Identification(i.e., Driver’s License/Green Card/Visa and Passport if applicable)Any documents referenced in the above Requested Qualifications (i.e., professional certifications, degrees, etc.)
